short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen to Bandcamp music on your TV via Chromecast

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bandcast is a Chrome extension that enables you to listen to your Bandcamp music on your TV via Chromecast.

Requires :
Chromecast and the Google Cast extension.

Need more information?

Please visit Website.
